text: Basi (twalwesile) ligongo lyakasa kwao chilanga ni kanila kwao ma Ȃya ga Allah, ni kuulaga kwao achimitume mwangali ligongo, ni kuŵecheta kwao kwanti: “Mitima jetu jewunichilidwe (kwanti ikulepeleka kwinjila yankulalichila mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ).” (Ngaŵa jewunichile,) nambo Allah atekudinda idindo pa jalakwejo ligongo lya ukafili wao, ni ngakukulupilila ikaŵeje panandipe
